courses.title: Calistung for Toddlers (Ages 3â€“4)
courses.subtitle: Early Introduction to Letters and Numbers Through Play
courses.description: Designed for younger learners, this program gently introduces the basics of reading and math through interactive storytelling, phonics songs, tracing lines and shapes, and sensory-based games. It helps toddlers become familiar with letters and numbers while developing fine motor skills and a love for learning.

courses.title: English for Kids (Soon)
courses.subtitle: Build Confidence in Speaking, Listening, Reading & Writing
courses.description: Our English program focuses on practical communication skills through fun and immersive activities. Children learn through songs, storytelling, interactive games, and simple conversations to build their vocabulary and confidence. Each lesson is crafted to make learning English joyful and effective.

courses.title: Holiday Camp Robotics (Soon)
courses.subtitle: Discovering Technology Through Hands-On Play
courses.description: Children explore the exciting world of robotics by building and controlling simple robots using age-appropriate tools and materials. Our STEAM-based approach (Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts, and Math) helps kids develop problem-solving, logical thinking, and creativity in a fun, safe environment.
